This github repository contains the data and R code scripts used for the preparation of the manuscript *Dietary restriction fails to extend life in stressful environments.* (Zajitschek, Felix, Zajitschek, Susanne RK, Vasconcelos, Ana CO, Bonduriansky, Russell. 2023, Functional Ecology, 2023. doi: 10.1111/1365-2435.14389). 

Please go to:
https://zajitschek.github.io/FunctionalEcology2023/
to access the annotated code and results in easily readable html format.
